Sentencas: The effects of hydrocarbon-contained in fuel gas on SOFC with Ni-YSZ as anode are evaluated in this study.
Titulo: Degradation Behavior of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) with Trace Hydrocarbons

Sentencas: Low concentration of toluene was mixed with 96.9% hydrogen and 3.1% steam to simulate bio-syngas, corresponding to current developments of biomass gasification technology.
Titulo: Degradation Behavior of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) with Trace Hydrocarbons

Sentencas: Power generation performance was investigated under Galvano-static-mode with toluene concentrations from 0 mg/Nm(3) to 1900 mg/Nm(3) at 850 degrees C for 30 hours.
Titulo: Degradation Behavior of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) with Trace Hydrocarbons

Sentencas: Impedance spectroscopy under OCV conditions was also conducted to assess SOFC's internal resistance.
Titulo: Degradation Behavior of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) with Trace Hydrocarbons

Sentencas: As the result, SOFC shows a good stability and generation performance without toluene exposure.
Titulo: Degradation Behavior of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) with Trace Hydrocarbons

Sentencas: However, the voltage decreases even under a low concentration of 380 mg/Nm(3) while keeping current density constant at 200 mA/cm(2).
Titulo: Degradation Behavior of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) with Trace Hydrocarbons

Sentencas: Furthermore, this degradation tends to be serious as concentration of toluene increases.
Titulo: Degradation Behavior of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) with Trace Hydrocarbons

Sentencas: Dramatic voltage drop and visible carbon deposition should not be insignificant when toluene's concentration was 1900 mg/Nm(3).
Titulo: Degradation Behavior of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) with Trace Hydrocarbons

Sentencas: This performance loss seems to be recovered to a certain extent without serious structure destruction on anode.
